title: Step 20

challengeFiles.name: main

tests.text: Your filter_expenses_by_category function should take expenses and category as the parameters.
tests.testString:
({ test: () => assert(runPython(`
    import inspect    
    sig = str(inspect.signature(filter_expenses_by_category))
    sig == '(expenses, category)'
  `))
})

description: Next, define a function named filter_expenses_by_category that takes two parameters: expenses and category. Use pass to fill the function body.
